chunk:
Herbaliz Moisturizing Gel (2019 formulation)

Brand: Herbaliz

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Gel*, Vegetable Glycerin, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose Oil)*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosa Mosqueta (Rose Hips) Seed Oil*, steam distilled essential oils of Petroselinum Sativum (Parsley Herb), Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium)*, Cupressus Sempervirens (Cypress)* and Daucus Carota (Carrot Seed).

(Rose Hips) Seed Oil*, steam distilled essential oils of Petroselinum Sativum (Parsley Herb), Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium)*, Cupressus Sempervirens (Cypress)* and Daucus Carota (Carrot Seed). *Certified Organic
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
